parameters.name: user
parameters.description: ID of the user (path parameter).

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Payload with fields to update on the user. 'name' and 'email' are required by server validation; 'password' is optional.

name.description: User full name. Validated by the AlphaName rule: one or more groups of letters/numbers (or letter marks) separated by a single separator (space-equivalent, apostrophe, underscore or dash).

email.description: User email address. Validation enforces uniqueness among users (excludes the current authenticated user in validation).

password.description: New password. Optional on update; if provided the controller hashes it before storing.

200.description: Successful update.

403.description: Forbidden. The authenticated user is not authorized to update this resource.

422.description: Validation Error. One or more fields failed validation.
